introduction: A soon-to-be collage freshman Hye-young moves to a new city on her own for the first time. Although she has dreamt of it for a long time, she is apprehensive and lonely now. Her new place feels desolate. The sponsor of the Asian short film & video competition, Mary Kay Korea has played the role of a producer in support of the selected Asian female directors and the IWFFIS has taken charge of planning. Director Park Ji-wan and producer Kim You-kyung of the Grand Prize winner of the 10th Asian short film & video competition, Highschoolgirls, have collaborated once again for this film. The director brings out ‘brand new start and spiritual growth’ with delicate sensibility and beautiful scenery. (Jay SOHN)http://www.kmdb.or.kr/vod/vod_basic.asp?nation=K&p_dataid=10958&pgGubun=01#url
